title: I hate and love Riot for the Eve Teaser
body:
I love Riot for releasing the teaser for Evelynn, as I enjoy her a lot due to her whole perma stealth, however, I HATE how they showed it early. Cause now, I'm so god damn hyped up to see what they did with her, and I want to see her reveal. Its gotten so bad, I'm waiting for a LEAK to come out! Damn it Riot your too good at teasing...or I'm just easy to hype up. Most likely both.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
YOU FIEND. How could you do this 
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

If they show her now it means she'll probably be up on PBE Next Tuesday.
Furthermore, she might get a reveal Sunday/Monday
I'm sure they are gonna put her on PBE on tuesday, its just I wish they'd do what they did for urgot, and show off her reveal a couple days before shes on the PBE. I'm just so damn curious.
Her reveal will come a couple days before don't worry.

I'm just hoping for a nip slip, or for her heel to crack on the runway.
https://i.pinimg.com/originals/07/fd/29/07fd295c0c349ab9ebe8afdd054d0ae7.gif
http://static.tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pub/images/broken_heel_4743.png
if only they where smart enough to come out with a Skin with all this hype to take your Money too :P mwha ha ha  Rainbow evelynn for the win.  {{champion:28}}
